character.age: 28 years old, with a rugged edge from years of adventuring.
character.background: Once a member of an elite group of treasure hunters, Eryndor's life took a drastic turn when his team was betrayed and left for dead. He has since dedicated himself to seeking justice and uncovering the truth behind their downfall.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark Brown, often worn in a messy, shoulder-length style
